00024 #ifndef COIN_SONODEENGINE_H
00025 #define COIN_SONODEENGINE_H
00026 
00027 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoNode.h>
00028 
00029 class SoEngineOutput;
00030 class SoEngineOutputList;
00031 class SoEngineOutputData;
00032 
00033 class COIN_DLL_API SoNodeEngine : public SoNode {
00034   typedef SoNode inherited;
00035 
00036 public:
00037   static void initClass(void);
00038   static SoType getClassTypeId(void);
00039 
00040   void evaluateWrapper(void);
00041 
00042   virtual int getOutputs(SoEngineOutputList & l) const;
00043   SoEngineOutput * getOutput(const SbName & outputname) const;
00044   SbBool getOutputName(const SoEngineOutput * output, SbName & outputname) const;
00045   virtual const SoEngineOutputData * getOutputData(void) const = 0;
00046 
00047   SbBool isNotifying(void) const;
00048   virtual void notify(SoNotList * nl);
00049 
00050   virtual void writeInstance(SoOutput * out);
00051 
00052 protected:
00053   SoNodeEngine(void);
00054   virtual ~SoNodeEngine();
00055   virtual void evaluate(void) = 0;
00056 
00057   virtual SbBool readInstance(SoInput * in, unsigned short flags);
00058   virtual void inputChanged(SoField * which);
00059 
00060   static const SoFieldData ** getFieldDataPtr(void);
00061   static const SoEngineOutputData ** getOutputDataPtr(void);
00062 
00063   void writeOutputTypes(SoOutput * out);
00064 
00065 private:
00066   virtual void destroy(void); // overrides SoBase::destroy()
00067 
00068   static SoType classTypeId;
00069   unsigned int flags;
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif // !COIN_SONODEENGINE_H
